medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient experienced generalized crampy abdominal pain that began around 1 am and has persisted for 12 hours. The pain is accompanied by nausea and 1 bout of non-bloody emesis. He denies fevers, chills, constipation, diarrhea, or urinary symptoms. Last bowel movement was yesterday.
